quotes: It's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
We are almost always bored by just those whom we must not find boring.
There is no conversation more boring than the one where everybody agrees.
Being dull and boring is far more tragic than being tacky.
There is nothing boring in life except ourselves
Never fail to know that if you are doing all the talking, you are boring somebody.
For most people, life would be boring without meaningful work.
The secret of being boring is to say everything.
